comments.body:
pull-kubernetes-bazel-build job is failed like
```
Execution platform: //:rbe_with_network
compilepkg: missing strict dependencies:
	/b/f/w/test/e2e_node/device_plugin_test.go: import of "k8s.io/api/apps/v1"
	/b/f/w/test/e2e_node/device_plugin_test.go: import of "k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/runtime/serializer"
No dependencies were provided.
Check that imports in Go sources match importpath attributes in deps.
ERROR: /home/prow/go/src/github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/test/e2e_node/BUILD:106:1 GoCompilePkg test/e2e_node/linux_amd64_stripped/_go_default_test-cgo%/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e_node.a failed (Exit 1): builder failed: error executing command 
```
I guess we need to run `./hack/update-bazel.sh` and apply the change into this PR.
